Description: Vertically moving elevator that moves up automatically when player step on it. It is also automatically called when player wait for it at the top of the whole travel altitude.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If selected, the func_plat is no more automatically called from top and activated by stepping on it. It required trigger to do so.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to enable it (or move it manually with "Toggle" flag checked). Func_plat is automatically enabled if this key is empty. With "Toggle" flag enabled the behaviour is based on trigger use-type: 'On'- move forward, 'Off'- move backward, 'Toggle'- move. With "Toggle" flag disabled all trigger use-types are accepted to enable lift. Can be kill-targeted.
How many units func_plat travels from it's starting position when someone step on it. Set to negative to make func_plat travels down.
Sets the minimum light level. Set this value if entity is too dark on compiled map. Also useful for things like computer screens or holograms. Default is 0, max 1.

Notes: Just specifying a targetname makes func_plat not working until triggered.
